channel.title: Heaven pkz
channel.description:
Hey,
I used Heaven pkz to build on because at the time i liked the new interfaces, but now i want to be able to use other clients with my source. But as soon as i log in with another client i get dced, is this due to anti-leech which i have never removed or due to signlink or something.
I would appreciate helpful posts please.
Thank you for reading

item.title: Heaven pkz
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Ty for posting, it is a bluurs but an edited bluurs, it was running with a uid which i removed when the server starts to run.

Kk erm any advice? the client which was released with it didnt come with notepad files, but i want to move on now.

I get this error from the other client i wish to log in with.

[code=]Loading client…
no midi or mp3 files in folder
loading custom spirts part 1
loading custom spirts part 2
headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 25104
at client.method145(client.java:13729)
at client.method62(client.java:3550)
at client.method7(client.java:2652)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120)
at client.run(client.java:93)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: Heaven pkz
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I haven’t seen the source, so don’t hold me on this one.

It might not be an anti-leach, it might only allow specific UID’s to connect to the server, or might have some things missing from the clients your trying to to use which the server needs, for example, bluurs doesn’t work on all servers.

Read full topic
